# scimo


<!-- badges: start -->

**scimo** provides extra recipes steps for dealing with omics data.

## Installation

You can install the **scimo** from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("abichat/scimo")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(scimo)
```
